channel.title: [PI] Some Help
channel.description: Hello, I need some help with the following issues: 1. How to make Master Wand autocast? 2. Make another anti-dragon shield eg. Make a divine spirit shield work against anti-fire 3. Finally how would you make the strykeworms on Hybridpvp look normal other than those steel dragons

item.title: [PI] Some Help
item.dc:creator: @infallibl3 infallibl3
item.description:
@infallibl3 wrote:

1, im not sure. 2, you need to find the statement in either actionhandler.java or itemhandler.java that the anti-fire shield is in, and add a case with the divine code as well.

3, you need to change the models in your client.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Some Help
